I am a test chatbot, that can recognize your intentions by the text. For now, I don't have an actuall purpose, but one day I'll grow to become the smartest chatbot ever:)
Btw, you can ask me about contacts of my creator (just telling(no pushing(please)))
I was created by Dima Zhogin. You can find him on GitHub @UnkindGoose or contact by email zhogin.dima @gmail.com or @vk.com
